amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on health care for retired members of the uniformed services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3298 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3298 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S7336-7340; text: CR S7339) To express the sense of Congress on health care for retired members of the uniformed services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3298 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3298 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lautenberg.
